showScoreExcerpt:
“Alex Timbers recreates his innovative staging with the action happening all around the audience...But the action moves so fast and so intensely, you’ll hardly notice the passing 90 minutes. Set designer David Korins has transformed the Broadway Theater into a vibrant, wild disco with moving platforms and runways which the theatergoers follow as jumpsuit-wearing techies direct them with landing lights as if they were airplanes taxiing for position.”
